description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Bugs
PDFNET-42918 Aspose.Pdf generates larger files than Aspose.Pdf.Generator
PDFNET-42663 Method access error occurs on converting an XPS to PDF
PDFNET-42675 Incorrect color of circles when converting an XPS to PDF
PDFNET-42714 XPS to PDF Conversion throws missing root element exception
PDFNET-42885 PDF to PPTX - Text is missing in resultant file
PDFNET-40901 PDF to PNG covnersion adds extra white space
PDFNET-42549 Failed PDF/A-1b validation after conversion
PDFNET-42544 After saving attachments, collection is empty.
PDFNET-42309 NullReferenceException on getting Document.pagei.Artifacts collection
PDFNET-42969 Argument out of range exception when saving PDF as HTML
PDFNET-42886 DOCX2PDFA different behavior between aspose and adobe reader PRO - Incident
PDFNET-42729 Aspose.Pdf generated slides within PowerPoint breaks fonts and formatting when Reuse slides
PDFNET-41389 PDF to PDF/A-2a - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-41386 PDF to PDF/A-2a - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-41367 PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-39454 PDF to HTML: characters are being replaced with boxes
PDFNET-42198 PDF to DOC: Text trimmed from top
PDFNET-42349 DropDown value is cropped when form is flatten
PDFNET-42350 DropDown value is rendered incorrectly
PDFNET-43141 Text replacement leads to column breaking (left shift of the word in second column)
PDFNET-41170 HTML to PDF - Field width is not preserved
PDFNET-41628 PDF to TIFF: black blocks in resultant TIFF image
PDFNET-41683 PDF to JPEG - Double space between letters
PDFNET-41845 PDF to BMP - Text appears overlapped in resultant image
PDFNET-42582 Text overlapping occurred when converting PDF to PNG
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
